name: Absorb Elements
effects: Trigger: You or an ally within Scope would take Astral or Lunar damage. Effect: They gain resistance to the damage

name: Aether Shield
effects: When you would take damage (after armor and resistances), you can spend mana to reduce the damage taken. You can reduce the damage by 2 for every 1 point of mana spent. You can`t use this ability on Piercing damage or Discord, or if you are incapable of taking reactions.

name: Agile Discord
effects: You can use AGI instead of MGK when making checks to clear Discord.

name: Aid
effects: Trigger: An ally within Scope makes an ability check or save.Effect: You grant them +1 ACC on the check or save.

name: Animate Objects
effects: 1/round as a Reaction when you take damage (after armor and resistance) or as part of the INTERPOSE reaction, you can take half as of the damage (after armor and resistance, rounded up) as Stress, and half of the damage as normal.As a Minor Action, you can deploy this shield to a free space within Scope as a Summon, or return it to you. The shield becomes a Size 1 piece of hard cover while deployed, and you lose the previous effect until reclaimed. (Tags: Summon, Size 1, 5 HP, 10 Dodge/A-Def).

name: Astral Imbue
effects: An ally within Scope gains an enchantment on a weapon of their choice until the end of their next turn, as per the Enchantment tag.Any Weapon: On Hit: Deals +1d6 bonus Astral damage.

name: Astral Projection
effects: (Tags: Summon, Size=Yours, 5 HP, Dodge/A-Def 10)You create a summon of your size in free spaces within Scope that doesn`t require Line of Sight. The summon is immune to Physical damage. You can use this summon as the point of origin for any spell or AETHERIC attacks you make. In addition, 1/turn the summon can (3) MARK a target during your turn as a free action, using your Scope.

name: Baleful Polymorph
effects: (6) Release: One character in Scope is transformed into a size ½ creature that can’t attack or activate spells. It can make a MAGIC save at the end of each of its turns to end this effect, and it automatically reverts to its normal form if it takes any damage. Each character can only be affected by this spell 1/scene.

name: Bane
effects: Trigger: An enemy within Scope makes an attack roll. Effect: You impose +1 DIF  on the roll.

name: Banish
effects: (6) Release: One target within Scope is removed from play. They return to play during PHASE 8: DELAY of the next round in the spaces they left or the nearest empty spaces. Each character can only be affected by this ability 1/combat.

name: Barkskin
effects: Minor: An ally within Scope gains 1 Focus.

name: Battle Chant
effects: Minor: Adjacent allies gain +1 ACC on their next attack roll before the end of the round.

name: Beast Bond
effects: When you use the REROLL TABLE, your summons within [Range 3] of you can suffer the effects instead of you.

name: Bestow Curse
effects: Minor: An adjacent enemy must pass a MGK save or be DAZED until the end of their next turn.

name: Bloodthirst
effects: On Crit: You regain HP equal to the damage the target takes from the attack, after armor and resistance.

name: Blur
effects: You gain +2 DODGE.

name: Cartwheel
effects: Trigger: You are hit by an attack. Effect: You can Shift 2 after the damage.

name: Catch a Breath
effects: During your turn, you can spend Focus to regain 1 HP per Focus spent.

name: Chill Touch
effects: Minor: Deal [2 Lunar] to an adjacent target.

name: Cleansing Touch
effects: Minor:  Spend 2 mana to remove a Condition from an adjacent ally.

name: Counterspell
effects: Trigger: A character in Scope uses a spell.Effect: The character must pass a MGK save or the spell is cancelled and the action lost.

name: Critical Healing
effects: When you restore HP to a BLOODIED character, they regain an additional 2 HP.

name: Danger Sense
effects: You get +1 ACC on saves against AOE effects.

name: Defensive Fighter
effects: 1/round when you crit with an attack, you gain 1 Focus.

name: Deflect
effects: Trigger: You are hit by an attack and reduce the damage to 0 through armor or other effects. Effect: You negate all effects of the attack against you, and can force the attack to instead target a character or object adjacent to you. The attacker rerolls the attack against the new target.

name: Delayed Healing
effects: When you would regain HP from any source, you only regain half the amount. At the start of your next turn, you regain HP equal to the original full amount, which isn’t halved by this skill. This effect isn’t optional.

name: Demigod
effects: You are immune to the DAZED condition, and your stress cap increases by +2

name: Desync
effects: Whenever you take a WOUND or OVERSTRESS, you can choose to be removed from play until the start of your next turn. You can’t affect or be affected by anything while removed from play except for effects already in play, like summons and traps. You enter play in the space you left, or the nearest empty space.

name: Distracting Force
effects: Minor: A character in Scope that is channeling must make a Concentration save.

name: Distracting Strike
effects: On Hit: Target is MARKED.

name: Distraction
effects: You (3) MARK all enemies within Burst 1.

name: Double Spell
effects: 1/round, when you activate a spell, you can spend 3 mana to activate a duplicate of the spell that must target something within [Range 5] of the original target. Characters can only be affected by one of these spells per turn.

name: Duck
effects: Trigger: You are hit by an attack. Effect: You gain resistance to any damage from the attack, but you become PRONE.

name: Efficient Burns
effects: When an enemy within Scope fails the check to clear Discord you contributed to, you regain 1 mana.

name: Empowered Spells
effects: 1/round you can spend 1 mana when activating a spell to increase the save target by 2.

name: Endless Endurance
effects: Your SURGE cost never goes above 1d6 Stress.

name: Energy Shield
effects: You or an ally within Scope gains 1 temp HP per mana spent, to a maximum of 5 mana. Until they lose all their temp HP, they have Resistance to Astral or Lunar damage, chosen by the caster when activated.

name: Etherealness
effects: You enter the ethereal plane, which gives you resistance to Physical damage but are permanently VULNERABLE to Force damage while in this state. You can return to your normal state as a Minor Action.

name: Execute
effects: You deal +1d6 bonus damage on critical hits against BLOODIED characters.

name: Exploding Heart
effects: On Hit: The target must make a BULK save.Failure: The Stress the target takes from this attack is instead equal to their BREAKING value if it is greater and they are STUNNED until the end of their next turn. Success: They are SLOWED until the end of their next turn.

name: Extend Spell
effects: You can spend mana to increase the range of a spell with range or Scope by +2 for every mana spent.

name: Extended Scope
effects: Your SCOPE is increased by +3

name: Fast Movement
effects: You have +1 SPEED.

name: Feel No Pain
effects: When you have 3 or more WOUNDS, you gain resistance to all damage. When you have 3 or more OVERSTRESS, you gain resistance to Stress. When at 4 WOUNDS / OVERSTRESS, you aren’t defeated and can keep acting as normal. Roll 1d6 whenever you take damage or Stress in this state. On a 1, you are defeated. You can’t regain HP or clear stress in this state until you REST.

name: Feral Instincts
effects: You are immune to the BLINDED condition.

name: Flare
effects: This spell consumes all your mana, and you must have at least 2 mana to use it. (6) Release: Create a [Blast 2] area within Scope. All characters in the area are auto-hit, taking [4d6 Force].

name: Flash Step
effects: You can teleport your standard move. You take 1 stress when you do this.

name: Frightening Howl
effects: All enemies in a [Burst 1] area must make a MND save. Failure: They take [2 Stress] and are unable to willingly move further away from you during their next turn.

name: Frost Bolt
effects: On Hit: Target must pass a BLK save or be SLOWED until the end of their next turn.

name: Frost Lance
effects: On Hit: Target must pass a BLK save or be SLOWED until the end of their next turn. On Crit: Target is automatically SLOWED until the end of their next turn, and also IMMOBILIZED if they fail a BLK save.

name: Ghost Fist
effects: Your 5 IMPROVISED ATTACK can deal Force damage, and you can OPPORTUNITY ATTACK with it as if it had [Reach 1].

name: Give Order
effects: One of your Summons within Scope can move up to 4 spaces, even if they don’t have a Speed.

name: Golden Carp
effects: Create a summon within Scope with the following stats: Size ½, 15 HP, Speed 1, can take no actions. As a free action during following turns, you can spend 2 mana. If you don’t, the summon is dismissed. After 6 mana is spent on this ability, the summon evolves into a Size 3 summon, pushing other characters out of its spaces and destroying non-objective objects and terrain it grows into. The summon heals all its HP, clears all conditions, and gains the ability to take actions. It gains the ability to fly, a speed of 4, and 2 armor. It gains the below Dragonflame weapon that it can use as a Standard Action.You must continue spending 2 mana as a free action during your turns to keep the summon active. Failure to do so dismisses the summon.Dragonflame. Melee Weapon [Line 15] | [6 Discord] On Attack: The area within the Line becomes Dangerous Terrain (AGI, 5 Astral). This terrain lasts until the end of the scene or until the summon is defeated/dismissed

name: Grounded Caster
effects: 1/round when you crit with a spell attack, the ground around you becomes supercharged until start of your next turn. Any non-flying characters that start their turn adjacent to you take [2 Astral].

name: Guard Break
effects: On Hit: The target can’t take reactions and is unable to INTERPOSE, take damage on the behalf of others, or make themselves the target of an attack on the behalf of their allies. These effects last until the end of their next turn.

name: Hamstring
effects: On Hit: The target takes [2 Stress] every time they make an attack or activate a spell until the end of their next turn.

name: Healer`s Pact
effects: You can activate this ability 1/scene as a free action when you restore HP to an ally. At the start of each of your subsequent turns, if you restored HP to an ally since the start of your prior turn, you regain 2 mana. If you didn’t, this effect ends.

name: Healing Summon
effects: (Tags: Summon, Size 1/2, 5 HP, 10 Dodge/A-Def) You create this summon in a free space within Scope. As a minor action while it exists, you can restore 4 HP to an ally within [Range 3] of it.

name: Heavy Draw
effects: Your weapons with range gain +3 range.

name: Hemmorage
effects: When you crit with a weapon attack, the target gains [1 Discord]

name: Heroic Leap
effects: You teleport up to your Speed, to a minimum of 2 spaces, and create a [Burst 1] area when you end the teleport. All adjacent characters take [2 Force].

name: Hexbolt
effects: (6) Release: One target within Scope takes [2d6 Lunar] and they are connected to a continuous beam of magic. As long as the target is within your Scope, you can use a Minor Action on subsequent turns to deal [2 Lunar] to the target automatically. The connection lasts until the target is no longer within your Scope, you use this ability again, or you become STUNNED or SILENCED

name: Hold
effects: (6) Release: One target within Scope takes [2 Stress] and is IMMOBILIZED until the end of their next turn.

name: Ice Crown
effects: You gain 3 ice shards, and you can have a maximum of 3 ice shards. As a Minor Action, you can expend a shard to make a ranged spell attack against a target within Scope, dealing [3 Lunar] on a hit.

name: Improved Energy Shield
effects: You or an ally within Scope gains 2 temp HP per mana spent, to a maximum of 5 mana. Until they lose all their temp HP, they have resistance to Astral or Lunar damage, chosen by the caster when activated.

name: Improved Interpose
effects: Your INTERPOSE reaction triggers with +1 range, and you can shift +1 space when doing so.

name: Improved Spells
effects: You deal +1 damage with all spells that deal Physical, Force, Astral, or Lunar damage (Stress and Discord is unaffected).

name: Improved Weapons
effects: You deal +1 damage with all weapons that deal Physical, Force, Astral, or Lunar damage (Stress and Discord is unaffected).

name: Jack of all Trades
effects: You gain +1 ACC on all ability checks.

name: Lava Lob
effects: If the target of this spell has Discord, a hit with this spell becomes a crit.

name: Leap
effects: As a Minor Action, you instantly climb to the top of something you are adjacent to.

name: Living Leyline
effects: You gain +1 ACC on MGK checks and saves, and +2 A-DEF. You lose these benefits while SILENCED.

name: Lunar Imbue
effects: An ally within Scope gains an enchantment on a weapon of their choice until the end of their next turn, as per the Enchantment tag.Any Weapon: On Hit: Deals +1d6 bonus Lunar damage.

name: Mana Battery
effects: You regain 1 mana at the start of each of your turns if you aren`t SILENCED and haven`t spent any mana since the start of your last turn.

name: Mental Discord
effects: You can use MND instead of MGK when making checks to clear Discord.

name: Monitor`s Pivot
effects: +1 ACC on MND checks and saves. +1 reach with all weapons that have reach.

name: Mortal Strike
effects: 1/turn when you 5 FIGHT and hit a target, you can take 1 Stress to make the attack a Mortal Strike. The target can`t regain HP or gain temp HP until the start of your next turn.

name: Mote Shield
effects: Minor: You provide an adjacent ally with protective energy. They next time they take damage, they regain 3 HP. A character can only have one mote shield effect on them at a time.

name: Multitasker
effects: Your SURGE cost never goes above 1d6+2 Stress.

name: Overwhelming
effects: Your save target is increased by +2. Whenever a character fails a save against you, they take [1 Stress]

name: Paragon
effects: You can pick two ancestry traits each quest.

name: Pass Without Trace
effects: You and all adjacent allies become INVISIBLE. Invisibility lasts until the start of your next turn. If a character forces a save, makes an attack, or targets something with a hostile effect, their invisibility ends.

name: Perfect Accuracy
effects: You can use the REROLL TABLE options an unlimited number of times per turn, as long as the conditions are met for each option.

name: Physical Discord
effects: You can use BLK instead of MGK when making checks to clear Discord.

name: Pincer Strike
effects: 1/round when you (3) VOLLEY or (5) FIGHT, you can attack with two different weapons. All attacks must target the same thing. You can’t use this ability when using a (7) FULL ATTACK.

name: Pummel
effects: Minor:  Deal [2 Physical] to an adjacent target.

name: Purge
effects: Minor: One character within Scope must pass a MGK save or you can remove one ongoing effect on them. This cannot be a status or condition.

name: Push Through Pain
effects: Trigger: You would take damage.Effect: The damage taken (after armor and resistances) becomes Stress damage instead of its normal damage type.

name: Push to the Edge
effects: You deal +2 Stress against BREAKING characters with abilities that deal stress.

name: Quick Hide
effects: You can (4) HIDE as a Minor Action.

name: Quick Rush
effects: You can (4) RUSH as a Minor Action.

name: Radar
effects: As a Minor Action, all enemies within [Range 5] of you lose HIDDEN.

name: Rage Caster
effects: You can take Stress in place of spending mana, at a rate of 2 Stress per mana.

name: Reckless Swing
effects: You can MARK yourself to reroll the damage of a melee attack (if you’re not already MARKED).

name: Reflect
effects: Trigger: You are hit by an attack and reduce the damage to 0 through armor or other effects. Effect: You can force the attack to instead target the attacker or another character or object within Range 8 of you. The attacker rerolls the attack against the new target.

name: Regeneration
effects: Heal 1 HP at the start of each of your turns while you are undefeated.

name: Reincarnate
effects: When you would be defeated, you immediately return to your HP maximum, 0 Stress, and remove the WOUND or OVERSTRESS that would have defeated you. All conditions, statuses, and discord on you are cleared.

name: Restful Presence
effects: During a SHORT REST, you and your allies automatically regain all their HP.

name: Retribution Shield
effects: Minor: You place a magical shield on an ally within Scope. Until the end of their next turn, they deal [2 Astral] to any character that hits them with a melee weapon attack.

name: Riposte
effects: You have +1 ACC with attacks that cost Focus to make.

name: Safe Travels
effects: You are immune to the damage and effects of Dangerous Terrain.

name: Third Wind
effects: Minor: Regain all your HP.

name: Slam
effects: Minor: An adjacent enemy must pass a BLK save or be DAZED until the end of their next turn.

name: Slippery
effects: Minor: You automatically escape from grapples

name: Spectral Dash
effects: You (4) RUSH, and can move through characters and objects when using movement from this action, and ignore ENGAGEMENT. You can’t end your turn sharing a space with something.

name: Stealth Spell
effects: The next time you 3 VOLLEY a spell this turn, you become INVISIBLE until the start of your next turn.

name: Stunning Summon
effects: (Tags: Summon, Size 1/2, 1 {HP}, 10 Dodge/A-Def)You create this summon in a free space within Scope. At the end of the next round it explodes in a [Burst 2] area. All characters in the area are STUNNED until the end of their next turn.

name: Super Mode
effects: When you use your ultimate, you also regain all HP, remove all stress, and roll 1d20. On a 20, your ultimate recharges.

name: Super Speed
effects: When you (4) RUSH, your speed is increased by +2 until the end of the turn.

name: Surprise Attack
effects: 1/round you can deal +1d6 bonus damage on a melee attack if the character has no adjacent characters aside from you.

name: Tactical Analysis
effects: Minor: You can (3) SEARCH to learn more about an enemy.

name: Taunt
effects: You make an enemy within Scope MARKED, and they must pass a MND save or take [2 Stress] and have +1 DIF on any attacks that don’t include you until the start of their next turn.

name: Telekinesis
effects: You can (5) SHOVE a target within Scope, and you count as Size 3 when doing so. Instead of choosing to Push them 1 space, you can Slide them 3 spaces.

name: Teleport Partner
effects: When you teleport, you can choose to bring an adjacent character with you. If they are unwilling, they must make a MGK save. On a failure, they are teleported.

name: The Unblinking Eye
effects: Trigger: An ally starts their turn.Effect: You can make an enemy MARKED.

name: There is No Escape
effects: You have +1 ACC on (5) GRAPPLE attacks and checks. You can still take reactions while grappling.

name: Throat Chop
effects: Trigger: An adjacent character activates a spell or begins channeling.Effect: They take [2 Stress] and are DAZED until the end of their next turn.

name: Thrust
effects: You can make Opportunity Attacks when a character enters one of your weapon’s reach, not just beginning their movement.

name: Thunder
effects: A target within Scope must pass an AGILITY save or gain [1 Discord]. Until the target clears all their Discord, whenever they fail the check to clear their Discord, you can use this spell as a Minor Action until the end of the scene or until you use it again, whichever comes first.

name: Thunderstomp
effects: Create a [Burst 1] area. All characters in the area must pass an AGILITY save or take [1 Stress] and become SLOWED until the end of their next turn.

name: Titan Grip
effects: If you have two HEAVY weapons equipped, you can turn them into a linked HEAVY-HEAVY weapon.

name: Toughness
effects: You gain +5 HP.

name: Trap Sense
effects: You don’t trigger the effects of traps unless you want to, and you have +1 ACC on any saves from traps.

name: Tremor Summon
effects: (Tags: Summon, Size 1/2, 5 HP, 10 Dodge/A-Def)Create a Summon in a free space within Scope. At the end of each of your turns, each enemy adjacent to the summon must pass an AGI save or be SLOWED until the end of their next turn.

name: Ultimate Protector
effects: You gain +1 Focus whenever you gain Focus.

name: Unarmored Defense
effects: You gain +1 armor if you don’t have a support item with the [armor] tag, and this armor still applies while you are SUNDERED.

name: Unbreakable Skin
effects: You gain +1 armor, to a max of 4 armor.

name: Unyielding
effects: Increase all forced movement you inflict by +1, and you can reduce forced movement on you by 1 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Vampiric Touch
effects: On Hit: You can spend 1 mana to regain {HP} equal to the damage the target takes from this attack, after {Armor} and resistance.

name: Voidspace Pockets
effects: You gain an additional MAIN support slot.

name: Voidspace Weapon
effects: You gain an additional MAIN weapon slot.

name: Water Walking
effects: You can move normally in liquid-based difficult terrain, like water.

name: Weave Magic
effects: You gain +2 Mana.

name: Whirlwind
effects: 1/round when you crit with a melee weapon attack, you deal [3 physical] to all adjacent enemies.

name: Wind Imbue
effects: An ally within Scope gains an enchantment on a weapon of their choice, as per the Enchantment tag. The Enchantment lasts until its effect is triggered.Any Weapon: On Crit: You can attack with this weapon again after the attack resolves
